response.original_title: maudlin of the Well: The Stone Sessions
response.overview: maudlin of the Well performed for the first time in 14 years on August 25th 2015 at The Stone in New York City.  The performances reunited original members Toby Driver (guitar, vocals) Greg Massi, Josh Seipp (guitars) Sam Gutterman (drums) Terran Olson (woodwinds, keys) Jason Byron (vocals, keys) and included special guest performances by Ron Varod (bass), and appearances by Mia Matsumiya (violin) and Daniel Means (tenor saxophone)
response.title: maudlin of the Well: The Stone Sessions
